content.rendered:
Foods that Fight Candida

top foods to 

FIGHT CANDIDA

Let food by thy medicine! 
You can naturally treat candida overgrowth and alleviate the symptoms by having a diet rich in the follow foods.

Learn More!

Choose high quality protein and stay away from processed meats. Organic Chicken, beef, and wild caught salmon are great choices.

Learn More!

Chia seeds, pumpkin seeds, almonds and walnuts are good for a candida fighting diet. 

Learn More!

Add more broccoli, cauliflower, asparagus, and leafy greens to your diet to kill candida.

Learn More!

Garlic has anti-inflammatory properties and onions have antifungal, antibacterial and anti-parasitic properties

Learn More!

Ginger, turmeric, cinnamon, and cayenne pepper are great to help fight candida because of their anti-inflammatory and anti-fungal properties.

Learn More!

Seaweed is naturally detoxifying to the body, so it becomes even more important while flushing out candida from the system

Learn More!

Swipe up for more details on foods that fight candida plus what foods you need to avoid.

Swipe Up!

excerpt.rendered: Struggling with a stubborn yeast infection? I’m sharing a list of the top foods that kill candida to give your system a yeast cleanse. 1. garlic 2. onions 3. seaweed 4. organic meats
